definitions.definition: An individual trained to medically stabilize people through various interventions, victims of trauma or medical events outside of a hospital setting and preparing them for transport to a medical facility.
An individual who is licensed at the state or national level to practice medical interventions in an emergency pre-hospital setting.
A mammal, Capra aegagrus hircus, and similar species of the genus Capra.
A lecherous man.
A scapegoat.
A Pontiac GTO car.
(speech recognition) A person who is not easily understood by a speech recognition system; contrasted with sheep.
A fool, loser, or object of ridicule.
To allow goats to feed on.
To scapegoat.
A floating platform attached at one end to a wharf so as to rise and fall with the tide, and thus facilitate passage between the wharf and a vessel lying beside the stage.
To act lazily or indolently while reclining; to lean; to lie at ease.
To hang extended from the mouth, like the tongue of an animal heated from exertion.
To let (the tongue) hang from the mouth in this way.
definitions.example: The ox stood lolling in the furrow.

definitions.definition: The act of colliding or crashing.
definitions.example: The skateboarder had a nasty wipeout as she came off the ramp.

definitions.definition: Total destruction or elimination.
definitions.example: The wipeout of this industry could be catastrophic.

definitions.definition: A young sheep.
The flesh of a lamb or sheep used as food.
A person who is meek, docile and easily led.
A simple, unsophisticated person.
One who ignorantly speculates on the stock exchange and is victimized.
Of a sheep, to give birth.
To assist (sheep) to give birth.
definitions.example: The shepherd was up all night, lambing her young ewes.

definitions.definition: The symbol £ representing the pound sterling
The symbol # on a telephone
The symbol # denoting weight in pounds
A marketplace, particularly in the Middle East and South Asia, and often covered with shops and stalls.
A shop selling articles that are either exotic or eclectic.
A fair or temporary market, often for charity.
A room for keeping clothes and armor safe, particularly a dressing room or walk-in closet beside a bedroom.
A governmental office or department in a monarchy which purchases, keeps, and cares for royal clothes.
The building housing such a department.
Any closet used for storing anything.
A room for keeping costumes and other property safe at a theater; a prop room.
The department of a theater, movie studio, etc which purchases, keeps, and cares for costumes; its staff; its room(s) or building(s).
A movable cupboard or cabinet designed for storing clothes, particularly as a large piece of bedroom furniture.
A tall built-in cupboard or closet for storing clothes, often including a rail for coat-hangers, and usually located in a bedroom.
Anything that similarly stores or houses something.
The contents of a wardrobe: an individual's entire collection of clothing.
Any collection of clothing.
Any collection of anything.
A private chamber, particularly one used for sleeping or urinating and defecating.
Badger feces, particularly used in tracking game.
To act as a wardrobe department, to provide clothing or sets of clothes.
The policy of a state of not intervening in the domestic affairs of another.
A piece of blotting paper in a pad as a piece of desk furniture
(law enforcement) a daily register of arrests and other events in a police station
A register of the related events made in the form of the list of times and brief descriptions
definitions.example: All transactions were entered in the cash blotter and agent's subsidiary ledger.

definitions.definition: A portion of blotter acid.
Somebody ranking next below a commander.
Someone ranking next below the person in charge.
A place of worship for Jews.
A congregation of Jews for the purpose of worship or religious study.
Indicating thinking or pondering.
definitions.example: Hmm... I just can't decide between the two.

definitions.definition: A demand for an answer to a question.
definitions.example: Just where were you until 2 a.m.? Hmm?

definitions.definition: A hummed tune, i.e. created orally with lips closed.
An often indistinct sound resembling human humming.
definitions.example: They could hear a hum coming from the kitchen, and found the dishwasher on.

definitions.definition: Busy activity, like the buzz of a beehive.
Unpleasant odour.
An imposition or hoax; humbug.
A kind of strong drink.
A phenomenon, or collection of phenomena, involving widespread reports of a persistent and invasive low-frequency humming, rumbling, or droning noise not audible to all people.
To make a sound from the vocal chords without pronouncing any real words, with one's lips closed.
definitions.example: We are humming happily along with the music.

definitions.definition: To express by humming.
definitions.example: The team ominously hummed “We shall overcome” as they came back onto the field after the break.

definitions.definition: To drone like certain insects naturally do in motion, or sounding similarly
To buzz, be busily active like a beehive
definitions.example: The streets were humming with activity.

definitions.definition: To produce low sounds which blend continuously
To reek, smell bad.
definitions.example: This room really hums — have you ever tried spring cleaning, mate?

definitions.definition: To flatter by approving; to cajole; to deceive or impose upon; to humbug.
An expression used to show contentment for something
definitions.example: Mmm, this is a tasty pie!

definitions.definition: An expression used to show thought or reflection
definitions.example: Mmm, I see what you mean.

definitions.definition: An expression used to show being muffled or not able to speak clearly, as well as "mmph".
Yes.
Expression of hesitation, uncertainty or space filler in conversation. See uh.
definitions.example: Let’s see... um... how about this?

definitions.definition: A seesaw; a piece of playground equipment consisting of a long board with seats at either end, with a pivot point in the center.
To ride a seesaw.
To cease from action, motion, work, or performance of any kind; stop; desist; be without motion.
To come to a pause or an end; end.
To be free from that which harasses or disturbs; be quiet or still; be undisturbed.
To be or to put into a state of rest.
definitions.example: I shall not rest until I have uncovered the truth.

definitions.definition: To stay, remain, be situated.
definitions.example: The blame seems to rest with your father.

definitions.definition: To lean, lie, or lay.
definitions.example: A column rests on its pedestal.

definitions.definition: To complete one's active advocacy in a trial or other proceeding, and thus to wait for the outcome (however, one is still generally available to answer questions, etc.)
definitions.example: I rest my case.

definitions.definition: To sleep; slumber.
To lie dormant.
To sleep the final sleep; sleep in death; die; be dead.
To rely or depend on.
definitions.example: The decision rests on getting a bank loan.

definitions.definition: To be satisfied; to acquiesce.
To remain.
To arrest.
(usually with "well") recovered
Not successfully; without success; to no avail.
A garment worn for swimming.
definitions.example: Put on your swimsuit and let's go for a swim.

definitions.definition: A tight-fitting one-piece garment worn by women and girls.
definitions.example: Jade refused to go swimming with her brother until he helped her find her favorite swimsuit.

definitions.definition: A sign for the control of traffic or the information of drivers.
definitions.example: The road signs on motorways are particularly clear and well lit at night.

definitions.definition: A 200th anniversary
A state of agreement; harmony; union.
Agreement by stipulation; compact; covenant; treaty or league
(grammar) Agreement of words with one another, in gender, number, person or case.
An agreement between the parties to a fine of land in reference to the manner in which it should pass, being an acknowledgment that the land in question belonged to the complainant. See fine.
(probably influenced by chord) An agreeable combination of tones simultaneously heard; a consonant chord; consonance; harmony.
A variety of sweet American grape, with large dark blue (almost black) grapes in compact clusters; a Concord grape.
To agree; to act together
A division or project of an organization to which costs can be specifically allocated.
A female jackaroo, a woman who does the job of a jackaroo.
A person who writes reviews for a newspaper or other publication; a critic.
An inspector.
A flat hairpin having two prongs that hold bobbed hair together.
A boat shoe
An eye lesion.
A displeasing sight; something prominently ugly or unsightly.
definitions.example: The building, towering over its surroundings with its square concrete frame and reflective walls of gold-tinted glass, was an eyesore visible throughout the city.

definitions.definition: An oval yellow spot near the center of the retina of the human eye, histologically defined as having two or more layers of ganglion cells, responsible for detailed central vision.
A small chamber of the inner ear of certain vertebrates filled with endolymph and containing an otolith.
A spot, as on the skin, or on the surface of the sun or of some other luminous orb.
A rather large spot or blotch of color.
In planetary geology, an unusually dark area on the surface of a planet or moon.
A book with a rigid binding, often of cardboard or leather.
(of a book) Having a rigid binding.
An implicit agreement or contract among members of a society governing such matters as submission of individuals to rule of law and acceptable conduct.
That promotes or exhibits expansion; expansionist.
A voodoo priestess (in Haiti)
A Latin-American musical genre, adapted from rumba, originating from Cuba in the 1940s, or a dance or rhythm of this genre.
To perform this dance.
A person who believes in or supports secularism.
A long loose robe worn mainly by women for sleeping in.
A dressing gown.
(underwater diving) A piece of equipment consisting of an oxygen tank and breathing apparatus used by divers to allow them to breathe underwater at depth.
To scuba dive.
To remove tangles or knots from.
definitions.example: With gentle combing, untangle your hair.

definitions.definition: (by extension) To remove confusion or mystery from.
definitions.example: It took a while, but he finally untangled the problem.

definitions.definition: A state of trouble, confusion and turbulence, especially in a political context; a time of riots, demonstrations and protests.
By means of a contract
A percussion instrument with a double row of tuned metal bars, each above the tubular resonator containing a motor-driven rotating vane, giving a vibrato effect.
Characterized by careless unconventionality; rakish.
Low-class; disreputable; vulgar.
Evil or wicked character or behaviour.
A wicked or treacherous act.
Characteristic of a villain.
A solid geometric figure with five faces.
A line marking the end of a race.
definitions.example: The five exhausted runners crossed the finish line one after the other.

definitions.definition: (by extension) The end of a process.
Any of a group of seamen who cruised on their own account on the Spanish Main and in the Pacific in the 17th century, who were similar to pirates but did not prey on ships of their own nation.
A pirate.
To engage in piracy against any but one's own nation's ships.
An extremely large store; a hypermarket.
An artificial passage for water, fitted with a valve or gate, for example in a canal lock or a mill stream, for stopping or regulating the flow.
A water gate or floodgate.
Hence, an opening or channel through which anything flows; a source of supply.
The stream flowing through a floodgate.
A long box or trough through which water flows, used for washing auriferous earth.
An instance of wh-stranding ellipsis, or sluicing.
To emit by, or as by, flood gates.
To wet copiously, as by opening a sluice
definitions.example: to sluice meadows

definitions.definition: To wash with, or in, a stream of water running through a sluice.
(more generally) To wash (down or out).
To flow, pour.
To elide the C` in a coordinated wh-question. See sluicing.
A clip that is used to keep a woman's hair in position.
A piece of indoor sporting equipment used to allow for the motions of running or walking while staying in one place.
A mill worked by persons treading upon steps on the periphery of a wide wheel having a horizontal axis. It is used principally as a means of prison discipline.
A mill worked by horses, dogs, etc., treading an endless belt.
To go.
Mild; calm.
definitions.example: lithe weather

definitions.definition: Slim but not skinny.
definitions.example: lithe body

definitions.definition: Capable of being easily bent; flexible.
definitions.example: the elephant’s lithe proboscis.

definitions.definition: Adaptable.
To become calm.
To make soft or mild; soften; alleviate; mitigate; lessen; smooth; palliate.
To attend; listen, hearken.
To listen to, hearken to.
Shelter.
Material applied to a wound for protection or therapy.
A sauce, especially a cold one for salads.
Something added to the soil as a fertilizer etc.
The activity of getting dressed.
Dress; raiment; especially, ornamental habiliment or attire.
The stuffing of fowls, pigs, etc.; forcemeat.
Gum, starch, etc., used in stiffening or finishing silk, linen, and other fabrics.
An ornamental finish, such as a moulding around doors, windows, or on a ceiling.
Castigation; scolding; dressing down.
The process of extracting metals or other valuable components from minerals
To fit out with the necessary clothing; to clothe, put clothes on (something or someone).
definitions.example: He was dressed in the latest fashions.

definitions.definition: To clothe oneself; to put on clothes.
definitions.example: I rose and dressed before daybreak.  It's very cold out. Dress warm.

definitions.definition: To put on the uniform and equipment necessary to play the game.
definitions.example: Due to a left ankle sprain, Kobe Bryant did not dress for the game against Indiana

definitions.definition: Of a man, to allow the genitals to fall to one side or other within the trousers.
definitions.example: Does sir dress to the right or the left?

definitions.definition: To prepare (food) for cooking, especially by seasoning it.
To prepare oneself; to make ready.
To adorn, ornament.
definitions.example: It was time to dress the windows for Christmas again.

definitions.definition: To ornament (a ship) by hoisting the national colours at the peak and mastheads, and setting the jack forward; when "dressed full", the signal flags and pennants are added.
To prepare (a set) by installing the props, scenery, etc.
To treat (a wound, or wounded person).
To prepare for use; to fit for any use; to render suitable for an intended purpose; to get ready.
definitions.example: to dress leather or cloth;  to dress a garden;  to dress grain, by cleansing it;  in mining and metallurgy, to dress ores, by sorting and separating them

definitions.definition: To prepare the surface of (a material; usually stone or lumber).
To manure (land).
To bolt or sift flour.
(sometimes imperative) To arrange in exact continuity of line, as soldiers; commonly to adjust to a straight line and at proper distance; to align.
definitions.example: Right, dress!

definitions.definition: To break and train for use, as a horse or other animal.
To make legally invalid.
definitions.example: The contract has been nullified.

definitions.definition: To prevent from happening.
To make of no use or value; to cancel out.
Lacking enthusiasm, energy, or strength; drooping or flagging from weakness, fatigue, or lack of energy
definitions.example: languid breathing

definitions.definition: Heavy; dull; dragging; wanting spirit or animation; listless; apathetic.
A languet in an organ (musical instrument).
The point in the launch of a rocket or an aircraft where it leaves contact with the ground.
The point at which a person or animal leaves the ground, as for example when jumping.
The act of imposing, laying on, affixing, enjoining, inflicting, obtruding, and the like.
That which is imposed, levied, or enjoined.
An excessive, arbitrary, or unlawful exaction; hence, a trick or deception put or laid on others.
Arrangement of a printed product’s pages on the printer's sheet so as to have the pages in proper order in the final product.
A practice of laying hands on a person in a religious ceremony; used e.g. in confirmation and ordination.
A task imposed on a student as punishment.
To toil, to work.
To belabour, to emphasise or expand upon (a point in a debate, etc).
definitions.example: I think we've all got the idea. There's no need to labour the point.

definitions.definition: To be oppressed with difficulties or disease; to do one's work under conditions which make it especially hard or wearisome; to move slowly, as against opposition, or under a burden.
To suffer the pangs of childbirth.
To pitch or roll heavily, as a ship in a turbulent sea.
Expressive of strenuous effort.
definitions.example: At the end of the marathon, her laboured breathing told us she was exhausted.

definitions.definition: Of writing or speech or similar, stilted or not natural due to too much effort being used in the production.
Fiction in which advanced technology or science is a key element.
definitions.example: Some people consider motion pictures such as the Star Wars movies more as fantasies than science fiction.

definitions.definition: Technology that, while theoretically possible, is not yet practical.
definitions.example: Despite decades of research, mass-market personal aircraft are still science fiction.

definitions.definition: A financial metric that is a measure of current assets of a business that exceeds its liabilities and can be applied to its operation
An inflatable suit to provide thermal insulation to the wearer and keep them dry while immersed in water.
A plant of certain species of the genus Brassica, or of related genera (especially Sinapis alba, in the family Brassicaceae, with yellow flowers, and linear seed pods).
Powder or paste made from seeds of the mustard plant, and used as a condiment or a spice.
definitions.example: When the waitress brought the food, I asked whether she had any Dijon mustard.

definitions.definition: The leaves of the mustard plant, used as a salad.
definitions.example: Mustard and cress sandwiches.

definitions.definition: Dark yellow colour, the colour of mustard.
The tomalley of a crab, which resembles the condiment.
Of a dark yellow colour.
A reducing to heads or articles; a formal agreement.
The act of capitulating or surrendering to an enemy upon stipulated terms; the act of ceasing to resist an opponent or an unwelcome demand.
The instrument containing the terms of an agreement or surrender.
An enumeration of the main parts of a subject.
A water sport where a rider on a small board is towed by a motor boat, attached by a cable.
A person employed to obtain and maintain the storage of provisions, especially food.
A person or company hired to provide and serve food, usually for a large group and at a location separate from where the food is prepared.
Exciting, energetic, enthusiastic, with gusto.
definitions.example: It was a rip-roaring bar fight, until the cops broke it up.

definitions.definition: To make ashamed; to embarrass; to destroy the self-possession of, as by exciting suddenly a consciousness of guilt, mistake, or inferiority; to disconcert; to discomfit.
To lose self-possession; to become ashamed.
Embarrassed, disconcerted, or ashamed.
A ring affixed to the snout of cattle, to make them follow immediately when a chain is attached to the ring.
A ring worn on a person's nose, for jewelry
(grammar) The function of a phrase that precedes a determiner in a noun phrase and modifies the head noun.
A very fine starch powder derived from corn (maize) used in cooking as a thickener, to keep things from sticking, or as an anti-caking agent.
Any horse or horse-like animal, especially one of the genus Equus.
Of or relating to a horse or horses.
Of or relating to any member or members of the genus Equus.
Any of many elongated arthropods, of the class Diplopoda, with cylindrical bodies that have two pairs of legs for each one of their 20 to 100 or more body segments.
To cause to be bitter.
A cloth used to cover and protect a table, especially for a dining table.
(of a patient) Found to be dead upon arriving at hospital.
Found dead at a scene, upon the arrival of an emergency medical service (EMS) or the police.
Of a new item: received broken.
Being a failure from the start, a nonstarter.
Collectively, the police, fire department and EMS services. May also include other response agencies.
Construction using whatever was available at the time.
Something constructed using whatever was available at the time.
To be held responsible for; to take the blame for something.
definitions.example: The mayor wil be answering for his crimes for many years.

definitions.definition: To guarantee.
definitions.example: I will answer for his debt, if he can't pay on the day.

definitions.definition: To vouch for (someone); to attest to the character of (someone).
definitions.example: She's known me for years, and she's always answered for me!

definitions.definition: Celebrating victory.
definitions.example: Athena, war's triumphant maid...

definitions.definition: The keeper, manager of a library.
One who cares for the publications, files etc. in a library, whether staff or volunteer.
A person who processes and organizes information.
A brief extra performance, done after the main performance is complete.
definitions.example: Can I get an encore? We want more!

definitions.definition: A call or demand (as by continued applause) for a repeat performance.
definitions.example: The encores were numerous.

definitions.definition: To call for an extra performance or repetition of, or by.
definitions.example: to encore a performer; to encore a song

definitions.definition: To call for an encore.
To perform an encore.
(said by audience members after a performance) Please perform again!
